t: Three Reasons Why You Should never buy a bike on Amazon.
s: October 29, 2019 - It’s seems like such a simple solution. Order your bike online, it gets shipped directly to you and you get to ride. Well…. it’s not quite that simple and our experience with customers that have bought bikes on line is ongoing. Don’t make the same mistake they did.
